mapper.insert: insert into ssq_history (code, game_code, game_name, sales, week, pool_money, bulletin_date, red_ball_1, red_ball_2, red_ball_3, red_ball_4, red_ball_5,red_ball_6, blue_ball_1, blue_ball_2, insert_date, content) values (#{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gameCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poolMoney,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bulletinDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{redBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redBall3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redBall4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redBall5,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{redBall6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blueBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blueBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ssq_history (code, game_code, game_name, sales, week, pool_money, bulletin_date, red_ball_1, red_ball_2, red_ball_3, red_ball_4, red_ball_5, red_ball_6, blue_ball_1, blue_ball_2, insert_date, content) values
(#{item.code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.gameCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sales,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poolMoney,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.bulletinDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.redBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redBall3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redBall4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redBall5,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.redBall6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.blueBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.blueBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.insertDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ssq_history set game_code = #{gameCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, game_name = #{gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=CHAR}, week = #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pool_money = #{poolMoney,jdbcType=CHAR}, bulletin_date = #{bulletinDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, red_ball_1 = #{redBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_ball_2 = #{redBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_ball_3 = #{redBall3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_ball_4 = #{redBall4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_ball_5 = #{redBall5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_ball_6 = #{redBall6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blue_ball_1 = #{blueBall1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blue_ball_2 = #{blueBall2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_date = #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select code, game_code, game_name, sales, week, pool_money, bulletin_date, red_ball_1, red_ball_2, red_ball_3, red_ball_4, red_ball_5, red_ball_6, blue_ball_1, blue_ball_2, insert_date, content from ssq_history where code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}

select code, game_code, game_name, sales, week, pool_money, bulletin_date, red_ball_1, red_ball_2, red_ball_3, red_ball_4, red_ball_5, red_ball_6, blue_ball_1, blue_ball_2, insert_date, content from ssq_history order by code desc
